questions.question_text: IP phone users report that the MWI light does not work while receiving VM messages. Which action must be taken to troubleshoot this issue?

choices.C: Reset MWI function in the Cisco Unity Connection

discussion.content: Greetings Admin is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: What is the admin profile used for supervisor to modify or configure the recorded messages of customer employees?

comments.content: No, Route Plan Report is where you can filter for Unassigned DNs.

discussion.content: I think the correct answer should be: Cisco Reporting Tool

questions.question_text: Which option would an administrator use to find all unassigned directory numbers in Cisco Unified Communications Manager?
An end user is experiencing performance issues with their IP phone. Which phone feature could the administrator configure to allow the end user to notify them when issues occur?

discussion.content:
QoS Requirements for Voice
Voice calls, either one-to-one or on a conference connection capability, require the following:

≤ 150 ms of one-way latency from mouth to ear (per the ITU G.114 standard)
≤ 30 ms jitter
≤ 1 percent packet loss
17 to 106 kbps of guaranteed priority bandwidth per call (depending on the sampling rate, codec, and Layer 2 overhead)
150 bps (plus Layer 2 overhead) per phone of guaranteed bandwidth for voice control traffic
Very confusing. Saw somewhere that <1% is considered high quality voice but as they don't stress in the question "high quality" they may want the 5% ??

questions.question_text: What is the maximum amount of packet loss an engineer should allow for voice traffic on an IP network?
